verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:10
verses.text: Now when Joab saw that the battle was set against him before and behind, he chose out of all the choice of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:11
verses.text: And the rest of the people he delivered unto the hand of Abishai his brother, and they set themselves in array against the children of Ammon.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:12
verses.text: And he said, If the Syrians be too strong for me, then thou shalt help me: but if the children of Ammon be too strong for thee, then I will help thee.
